title: Mirror

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reflect visits from a player each night. You will redirect all visits on them, including astral visits, to another player of your choice.
- With the Necronomicon, you may additionally attack one of the two players selected with your ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune
- You will learn when players submit targeting Coven members as their action. You learn both who gets targeted and whoever submits the action.
- You have a Basic autovest. When you lose this autovest, you lose your second attribute.
